name: typique-umbrella
description: Bundler-agnostic, zero-runtime CSS-in-TS â€” powered by a TypeScript plugin
author: Aleksei Berezkin

scripts.build: npm run build:bin && npm run build:root && npm run build:plugin
scripts.build:root: (cd packages/typique && tsc && mv index.js index.mjs && mv util/index.js util/index.mjs && tsc --project tsconfig.cjs.json)
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.clean: npm run clean:bin && npm run clean:root && npm run clean:plugin && npm run clean:log && npm run clean:output && npm run clean:per-file
scripts.clean:bin: rm -f bin/*.js && rm -f bin/*.mjs && rm -f bin/*.d.ts && rm -f *.tsbuildinfo
scripts.clean:root: (cd packages/typique && rm -f index.js && rm -f index.mjs && rm -f index.d.ts && rm -f *.tsbuildinfo)
scripts.clean:log: rm -f test-server/tsserver-*.log && rm -f test-server/ti-*.log && rm -f test-bin/*/*.log
scripts.test: npm run test:root && npm run test:unit && npm run test:serverUnit && npm run test:server && npm run test:bin
scripts.test:server: npm run test:server:old && npm run test:server:new
